metadata.title: CVE-2019-14824 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in the 'deref' plugin of 389-ds-base where it could usethe 'search' permission to display attribute values. In someconfigurations, this could allow an authenticated attacker to view privateattributes, such as password hashes.

criterions.comment: 389-ds-base: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
